title: List of all Android instagram  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android instagram  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: StoriesProgressView
repoList.description: show horizontal progress like instagram stories.

repoList.name: CropperNoCropper
repoList.description: Instagram Style Image Cropper for Android (Library)

repoList.name: AndroidInstagram
repoList.description: Android wrapper library to access Instragram API

repoList.name: Spark
repoList.description: 🎨 An Android library to create gradient animation like Instagram&Spotify

repoList.name: instagram-filters-jhlabs-android
repoList.description: Implementation of some Instagram filters using jhlabs library for android

repoList.name: Flowing-Gradient
repoList.description: Android Library to make a flowing gradient effect, similar to that used in Instagram Android login screen

repoList.name: SimpleAuth
repoList.description: A easy to use social authentication android library. (Facebook, Google, Twitter, Instagram)

repoList.name: social-login-helper-Deprecated-
repoList.description: A simple android library to easily implement social login into your android project

repoList.name: PhotoEditor
repoList.description: A Photo Editor library with simple, easy support for image editing using paints,text,filters,emoji and Sticker like stories.

repoList.name: Stories
repoList.description: A library for Instagram-inspired stories for Android.
